title: Ep. 528 - Flatten The Narrative
description:
Now that the United States has flattened the curve, President Trump is flattening the narrative at a White House briefing that not only brutalized the press but also prepared the way for a reopening. We will examine the grand strategy behind owning the libs. Then, a new study out of Israel suggests the global economic shutdown was completely pointless, Bernie Sanders endorses Joe Biden, and Joe’s lead in the polls evaporates.

Check out The Cold War: What We Saw, a new podcast written and presented by Bill Whittle at https://www.dailywire.com/coldwar. In Part 1 we peel back the layers of mystery cloaking the Terror state run by the Kremlin, and watch as America takes its first small steps onto the stage of world leadership.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Knowles
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
